name: Teleidoscope
short_description:
Features:
* Input images
  - Capture images from USB camera periodically (but slow)
  - Load user specified images
* Kaleidoscopic rendering with the following mirror layouts:
  - Mandala (4 ~ 20)
  - Half triangle
  - Triangle
  - Square
  - Dodecahedron
  - Icosahedron
* Cursor movement
  - Automatic (windy 1/f fluctuation)
  - Manual (user can move the cursor by the mouse left drag)
* Color adjustment
  - Saturation
  - Brightness

Requirements:
- .NET 2.0
- OpenGL SL 1.10

Dependency:
- OpenTK 1.1

More video
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ASoqQtDA_0s for Mandala mode
